name: Nepali Gajal - Nepali Sahitya
description: Nepali Gajal - Nepali Sahitya is a collection of bundle of Nepali Literature Creations from different nepali people who are fully interested in Nepali Literature. This App uses Nepali Language. Many sorts of Literary Articles are collected on any topic and idea specially related to Nepali Literature.  Nepali Gajal - Nepali Sahitya consists of many catogories: Nepali Gajals, Nepali Geets, Nepali Poems, Nepali Muktaks, Nepali Jocks, Nepali Stories or short stories, Nepali Articles on any particular topic especially related to Nepali Lirerature,  People who are fully interested to Nepali Literature, can send their creations to this app for publication. They can send us only their own Lirterary creations to publish in the app.  Please, feel free to send us your response to the mail themediahousenepal@gmail.com  Enjoy the App !  (Note: This app is updated from time to time for new entries and arrivals.)
